alert.note: Alert for Adair; Green; Metcalfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:29PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Green, north central Metcalfe and west central Adair Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Edmonton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Metcalfe, west central Adair and south central Green Counties, including the following locations... Pickett, Portland, Little Barren, Node, Thurlow, Fry, Keltner, Exie, Liletown and Newt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
